dcterms:creator: Paul Bergmann
Kilian Batzner
Michael Fauser
David Sattlegger
Carsten Steger
dcterms:description: The MVTec dataset is an industrial anomaly detection benchmark containing 15 categories with about 200 normal samples and 100 anomaly samples for each class, providing various types of anomalies with pixel-level segmentation ground truths.
dcterms:title: MVTec

dcterms:creator: Pankaj Mishra
Riccardo Verk
Daniele Fornasier
Claudio Piciarelli
Gian Luca Foresti
dcterms:description: The BTAD dataset contains approximately 2500 real-world industrial images of three products, posing a challenge for anomaly detection due to some anomalies being located in the edge regions of the images.
dcterms:title: BTAD
